issue.title: Merge tool can't specify JS fix version
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3113](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3113). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Specifying a JS-x.x.x fix version doesn't work anymore because of the fix for ARROW-2220.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3113?focusedCommentId=16590291) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Sorry about that. Fixing should not be too hard

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3113?focusedCommentId=16590330) by Brian Hulette (bhulette):*
No worries, sorry you had to manually override JS-\* releases so many times. Yeah it's a pretty easy fix, the most challenging part will be testing it. Fortunately there are several JS PRs in the pipeline I can try it out on soon enough.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3113?focusedCommentId=16625235) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
This was resolved in https://github.com/apache/arrow/commit/3160cf182f528c997da33d7ab76755c26ba63c37. Thanks `[~bhulette]`!
